propel.core.utils
Class StreamUtils

java.lang.Object
  propel.core.utils.StreamUtils

public final class StreamUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Provides utility functionality for Stream-related classes

Method Detail

copy

public static void copy(java.io.InputStream from,
                        java.io.OutputStream to,
                        long length)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Copies data from one stream to another. Reads all data from source stream, then writes it to destination, then the destination stream is flushed.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - An argument is out of range.
java.io.IOException - An I/O exception occurred.

writeFully

public static void writeFully(java.io.OutputStream stream,
                              byte[] data)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Blocks until all data is written to the given stream. The stream is flushed.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null.
java.io.IOException - An I/O exception occurred.

writeFully

public static void writeFully(java.io.OutputStream stream,
                              byte[] data,
                              int maxChunkSize)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Blocks until all data is written to the given stream. The stream is flushed. Performs multiple writes if the size if bigger than the maximum allowed chunk size.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - An argument is out of range.
java.io.IOException - An I/O exception occurred.

readUntil

public static java.lang.String readUntil(java.io.InputStream stream,
                                         char terminator)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Reads a string from the UTF8-encoded byte-stream until a terminator character is found. The terminator character is thrown away and the stream moves past it.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null.
java.io.IOException - An I/O exception occurred.

                                         java.lang.String terminator)
                                  throws java.io.IOException

readUntilPeeking

public static java.lang.String readUntilPeeking(java.io.Reader textStream,
                                                char terminator)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
Reads a string from the stream until a terminator character is found. The terminator character is not read (but peeked) therefore the stream does not move past it.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - A stream was passed that does not support peeking (mark/reset)
java.io.IOException - An I/O exception occurred.
